subject: Hockey, Ice
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: The long-delayed trial in the civil suit brought by Steve Moore against Todd Bertuzzi, the Vancouver Canucks and Marc Crawford has been pushed back again, to late January from Sept. 24, lawyers for Moore confirmed Saturday.
snippet: The long-delayed trial in the civil suit brought by Steve Moore against Todd Bertuzzi, the Vancouver Canucks and Marc Crawford has been pushed back again, to late January from Sept. 24, lawyers for Moore confirmed Saturday.
